The Cloud Foundations for Tech course will help you explore\\r cloud services that EPAM provides, operate cloud-related terminology, and become confident\\r when working with cloud technologies.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CloudX: Foundations for Business\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - The Cloud Foundations for Business course will help\\r you explore cloud services that EPAM provides, operate cloud-related\\r terminology, and become confident when working with cloud technologies or promoting cloud\\r solutions to clients.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Refer the links to complete the courses:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=4c6fd73f-2582-46e4-98d9-4a0cabdfc1ec\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CloudX: Foundations for Tech\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=01a3f4ec-6a72-43de-9e83-e39897bf3a79\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CloudX: Foundations for Business\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
